about_the_game:
Game Description:

The Story of a Necromancer Betrayed by the Dark Lord: Begin Your Revenge!

In this game combining survival, roguelite, and tower defense elements, become the betrayed necromancer and embark on a journey of vengeance. Battle countless monsters, turn them into minions, and place various totems to defend against enemy attacks. Gather summoning materials to summon the Dark Lord and complete your revenge!

Game Features:

  • Defeat Countless Monsters: Engage in battles with numerous monsters and turn them into your minions. Build a more powerful army to overwhelm your enemies.

  • Place Various Totems: Deploy various totems to protect yourself and strengthen your minions. Strategically use totems to fend off enemy attacks.

  • Diverse Builds: Utilize summoning, totems, and magic to create various builds. Find the optimal strategy to easily defeat your enemies.

  • Soul Collection and Shop: Collect souls and gain experience through battles. Purchase powerful items from the ghost shop to enhance your necromancer.

Game Controls:

  • Keyboard Movement: Use the keyboard to move your character and explore the battlefield.

  • Summon and Place Units: Select and strategically place summoned minions, magic, and totems.

    Reach the climax of your revenge by summoning the Dark Lord. It's time to unleash the power of the necromancer!
